Posts.EditableText: Hello! Does anyone know how to make a game a 'work in progress?' And can you edit a work in progress???
Posts.HTML: Hello! Does anyone know how to make a game a 'work in progress?' And can you edit a work in progress???

Posts.EditableText:
If you want players to be able to continue playing after you have published it, I would STRONGLY ADVISE to not make it a WIP.  Finish before you publish it.  Or, don’t publish and share your .aslx file or login info with trusted game testers.

EDIT:  By “continue playing it...” I mean that they would need to restart every time you updated the game.  It’s been done before (I think) but having someone pick up where they left off after you edit is certainly not easy to code as far as I know.
